sentences.en: 25 officers were investigated following allegations of improper conduct during the murder inquiry.
sentences.cn: 25名警察在被指控于调查谋杀案期间有非法行为之后受到调查。

sentences.en: 25 officers were investigated following allegations of improper conduct.
sentences.cn: 25名警官被指控行为不当而受到调查。

sentences.en: Don't make presumptuous comments out of ignorance. Don't make improper comments before you know the whole story.
sentences.cn: 不要不明原委,就妄加评论.

sentences.en: Frequent skimming or improper skimming can cause a much higher dross loss.
sentences.cn: 撇渣过频或操作不当会使浮渣损失很大.

sentences.en: He would never be improper, he is always the perfect gentleman.
sentences.cn: 他总是举止得体，一直是个完美的绅士。

sentences.en: Is it improper for such doing?
It was improper of the broker to withhold the information from the stock exchange.
sentences.cn: 股票经纪人对交易所隐瞒信息的行为是不正当的.

sentences.en: It would be improper of me to comment before the election outcome is known.
sentences.cn: 在选举结果未知的情况下我作出评论是不恰当的。

sentences.en: It's improper to drop in on him so casually.
sentences.cn: 这样冒冒失失去找他可不好.

sentences.en: Laughing and joking are improper at a funeral.
sentences.cn: 葬礼时大笑和开玩笑是不合适的.

sentences.en: Persons with diabetes suffer from improper metabolism of sugar.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病人的糖代谢受到阻碍.
她认为我高兴是不合时宜的.

sentences.en: Short trousers are improper at a dance.
sentences.cn: 舞会上穿短裤不成体统.

sentences.en: The actions of very vain , heartless, pleasure - seeking people are very often improper.
sentences.cn: 凡是爱虚荣、贪享受 、 没心肝的人,作出来的事多半下流.

sentences.en: The Committee said his actions were improper and repugnant.
sentences.cn: 委员会称他行为失当，令人反感。

sentences.en: The improper use of medicine could lead to severe adverse reactions.
sentences.cn: 用药不当会产生严重的不良反应。

words.tran_cn: 不适当；不正确；用词错误；[审计] 不正当行为

phrases.tran_cn: 处理不当；搬运不当；操作不当

trans.tran_cn: 不合适的，非正常的，不正确的，不正派的，不合礼仪的，不道德的
